Html:
Hi, using the shopping cart from MvcMusicStore, i have deployed my site on the production server.

All the features of the Shopping Cart is working fine in localhost. But on the production server the 'remove from cart' option is not working.

When clicked, it just remains on the same page. What is the issue here? Session? Json handler?

How do i workaround this issue?

Any tips would be highly appreciated! :)
